markdownRemark.html:
The company — "Magento" or "Magento, An Adobe Company" — includes several products in the following categories: digital commerce, order management, and other industry solutions. The Magento term is a registered trademark and a company name.

After the merger, Magento has become a part of Adobe in their Adobe Experience Cloud. See the Magento offering as Adobe Commerce Cloud.

And remember, Magento is the awesome eCommerce company. Magneto is a super villain. And Magenta is a great color.

Learn more: Magento not Magneto, Magento, Magento Brand Guidelines
